message.entry: ''{0}'' is not a valid {1} Control resource name. Resource name must be a valid C/C++ variable name.
The model, ''{0}'', does not have root input or output ports.\nTo generate {1}_control controller package, the Simulink model must contain at least one root inport or outport block.
The Simulink model ''{0}'' has already been closed, so any changes to {1} Control settings will be discarded.

To generate {1} Control controller package, the ''CodeInterfacePackaging'' parameter must be set to ''Nonreusable function''. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit"> <cmd>set_param(''{0}'',''CodeInterfacePackaging'',''Nonreusable function'')</cmd> <txt>Set the CodeInterfacePackaging to ''Nonreusable function''.</txt> </action> </actions>
To generate {1} Control controller package from the Simulink model, ''{0}'', specify the settings below.
''{0}'' is not a valid {1} Control controller C++ class name. Class name must contain alphanumeric characters or '_' only.
Specify the name of the resource and select the resource type.
Select the parameters for use with dynamic reconfigure.

entry.note: Prefix for ROS Control dynamic reconfigure parameters description

message.entry: Invalid data type for root input/output ports.\n{0}To generate {1} Control controller package, the data type for all the root input/output ports must be ''double''.
Invalid port width for root input/output ports.\n{0}To generate {1} Control controller package, the port width for all the root input/output ports must be ''1''.
